orders.title: Rush Order (Vendor)
orders.notes: Menu: 3 › Order Management › Rush Order. Use for urgent fills outside the normal schedule.
steps: Open: 3. Order Management › Rush Order› AM / Ad Match.
Scan product UPCs or enter article/UPC manually.
Press F12 to finalize/submit the order.
orders.example: Need 20 cases of Pepsi for next week’s promo: Rush Order → delivery 06/04/25 → scan Pepsi UPC → set qty 20 → F12 to submit.
